artefact.overview: You need a licence to burn heather, rough grass, bracken, gorse or vaccinium outside the burning season in Wales
artefact.licence_short_description: Licence to burn heather, rough grass, bracken, gorse or vaccinium outside the burning season in Wales.
artefact.licence_overview:
If you wish to burn heather, rough grass, bracken, gorse or vaccinium outside the burning season or in a way that the regulations prohibit you can apply to the Welsh Ministers for a licence.

You must submit the proper form at least 28 or 56 days ahead of the planned burn, depending on whether you wish to make a burn in or out of season.
